key.name: access-phase-token
key.description: The authorization token for the currently logged in Tumblr user, if any

key.name: access-phase-token-secret
key.description: The cryptographic secret used to sign requests against the authorization token for the currently logged in Tumblr user, if any

key.name: access-phase-username
key.description: The user name of the currently logged in Flickr user, if any

key.name: default-size
key.description: A numeric code representing the default size for photos uploaded to Tumblr

key.name: default-blog
key.description: The name of the default blog of the user, if any
